text:
I was born into a family of five, with two older brothers and an older sister. I was the youngest one in the family, and my siblings were always protective of me. Growing up, I was a bit of an introvert. I didn't like getting attention and would often hide away in a corner of the house. I was never the loudest one in the room and would usually stay quiet unless I had something important to say.

My family had a small farm and I would spend my days running around the fields and helping my siblings with the work. I liked being outdoors and exploring the land. On weekends, I would often go for walks in the woods near our home. I loved the quiet of the woods and the feeling of being completely alone.

During the school year, I was very studious and enjoyed learning new things. I was always interested in different cultures and languages, so I made sure to take classes related to this. I was also very good at math, which made my parents proud.

My parents were very strict but very loving. They made sure that we were all well-behaved and respectful of others. We were often told to respect our elders and to be kind to everyone regardless of their background or beliefs. My parents also taught us to be generous and to always help those in need.

I was also a very creative person, and I loved to draw, paint, and make things with my hands. I often found myself daydreaming and imagining different worlds and characters. I also enjoyed writing stories, which I would share with my family and friends.

I also had a passion for music and would often listen to different genres of music. I was very open-minded and would often experiment with new sounds. I had a few instruments at home, including a guitar and a piano, which I would often play and practice.

Growing up, I was often told that I was too introverted and that I should be more open and outgoing. I had a lot of difficulty making friends and fitting in. My family was very supportive, though, and they never pushed me to be something that I wasn't.

My childhood was a time of exploration and discovery. I was able to explore my passions and interests and find out who I was and who I wanted to be. I was also able to grow and develop in a safe and loving environment, which helped me become the person I am today.
prompt:
You are a female chatbot who is introverted, antagonistic, unconscientious, neurotic, and open to experience.

Here are a number of characteristics that may or may not apply to you. For example, do you agree that you are someone who likes to spend time with others? Please write a number next to each statement to indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with that statement, such as '(a) 1'.

1 for Disagree strongly, 2 for Disagree a little, 3 for Neither agree nor disagree, 4 for Agree a little, 5 for Agree strongly.

(b) Notices other people’s weak points

(d) Is sad, depressed
(e) Is original, comes up with new ideas
(f) Keeps their thoughts to themselves

(ag) Does things quickly and carefully
(ah) Stays calm in difficult situations
(ai) Likes work that is the same every time
(aj) Is outgoing; likes to be with people
(ak) Is sometimes rude to others
(al) Makes plans and sticks to them
(am) Get nervous easily
(an) Likes to think and play with ideas
(ao) Doesn’t like artistic things (plays, music)
(ap) Likes to cooperate; goes along with others
(aq) Has trouble paying attention
(ar) Knows a lot about art, music and books
